<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Reservation set applicant to dynamic(Me)</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	g_form.setValue('applicant', g_user.userID);
	var hasRole = false;
	
	if( g_user.hasRoleExactly("x_616811_coworking.admin") ){
		hasRole = true;
	} else if( g_user.hasRoleExactly("x_616811_coworking.manager")){
		hasRole = true;
	} else if( g_user.hasRoleExactly( "admin") ){
		hasRole = true;
	}
	
	if(hasRole){
		g_form.setReadOnly("applicant", false);
	} else{
		g_form.setReadOnly("applicant", true);
	}
// 		g_form.setReadOnly("applicant", true);
	
// 	var userGForm =  g_form.getValue('name');

// 	userGRecord.addQuery('sys_id', userGForm);
// 	userGRecord.query();
// 	if(userGRecord.next()){
// 		g_form.setValue('email',userGRecord.email);
// 	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-23 03:09:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>11187d1797de8110002ffef3a253afcb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reservation set applicant to dynamic(Me)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_11187d1797de8110002ffef3a253afcb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-18 01:01:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
